short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize comments from Reddit with AI, and have it read aloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SummaReader is an AI-powered accessibility extension that provides summarized read aloud for Reddit comments tailored to vision-impaired users, or anyone who prefers a summary. The AI model used to summarize can be changed, along with the voice of the reader. In the future, new AI model options will be added and translation will be supported.
